steps.name: I want to navigate the "http://elearningm1.upskills.in/"
I want to give the username "admin"
I want to give the password "admin@123"
I click on Login button
I verify the homepage

elements.name: To verify whether application allows admin to add a course to user

steps.name: I want to click the Administration link
I want to click the Add users to course link
I want to Add user from userlist
I want to Add course from courselist
I Click Add to the course(s) button
I verify "The selected users are subscribed to the selected course" message displayed

arguments.val: The selected users are subscribed to the selected course

elements.name: To verify whether application allows admin to add new course category

steps.name: I want to click the Administration link
I want to click the Courses Categories link
I want to click the Add Category Icon
I want to give the Category code "BL_IBM_SDET"
I want to give the Category name "Blended Learning"
I want to click the Category radio button
I click the Add Category button
I Verify "Created" message displayed
